content: Just past this Dual-Blade Monk, you can follow the rest of the trail to arrive at a small muddy field with a lone stone monument. The field is full of Aged Ginseng to harvest (and a few Ginsenglings), but one of them in the middle of the field is much more than it seems: A Yaoguai Chief.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Towers of Karma' and the sub-subsection 'The Treasure Hunter's Quest - Continued'.
The content is as follows:
Just past this Dual-Blade Monk, you can follow the rest of the trail to arrive at a small muddy field with a lone stone monument. The field is full of Aged Ginseng to harvest (and a few Ginsenglings), but one of them in the middle of the field is much more than it seems: A Yaoguai Chief.
